statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{9 \, x^{3} - 4 \, x^{2} + 13 \, x - 8 , -x^{3} + 3 \, x^{2} - 3 \, x + 4 , -3 \, x^{2} + x - 5 , 5 \, x^{3} + 2 \, x^{2} + 3 \, x - 2 , -6 \, x^{3} - 2 \, x^{2} - 5 \, x + 1\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
